author: Jon Porter
title: Google ups Duo group calling limit from eight to twelve
description: Google is increasing the maximum number of people who can participate in a Duo video call from eight to twelve. The announcement did not mention whether the increase was permanent.
content:
We recognize group calling is particularly critical right now
Image: Google
Google is increasing the maximum number of people who can participate in a Duo call from eight to twelve, the companys senior director of product management announced on Twitter. We… [+1274 chars]
